oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Speech Recognition System for Polish: Parliamentary Speech
oai_dc:dc.dc:creator: Koržinek, Danijel
Marasek, Krzysztof
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: speech recognition
speech alignment
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: This resource contains dockerized models and scripts of an automatic speech recognition system for Polish trained on Polish Parliament speeches. The system is based on the Kaldi toolkit. The scripts include methods for performing speech recognition, forced alignment and a lenient alignment of audio. The Github repository contains information on how to use the tool.
